title: Sakurako-san no Ashimoto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
title_jp: 櫻子さんの足下には死体が埋まっている
synopsis: Shoutarou Tatewaki, a high schooler living in Asahikawa City, Hokkaido, meets Sakurako Kujou, a bone-loving ojou-san who has an ability to analyze specimen. Because of meeting her, he has to accompany her to various cases.
